description:
The originator of the http://anidb.net/ch16972 [Justaway] explosive.
He used to work in a government but got laid off due to company restructuring, and he became a terrorist in his bitterness. He started a factory, taking in displaced and bitter samurai who also wanted revenge. The factory acts as a front for the manufacture of http://anidb.net/ch16972 [Justaway], which is actually a bomb. http://anidb.net/ch1658 [Yamazaki Sagaru] was sent here as a spy to uncover more about the mysterious http://anidb.net/ch16972 [Justaway] in Episode 32. It turned out that the factory also manufactured heavy artillery like the http://anidb.net/ch16974 [Mamushi Z] laser canon.
name: Mamushi no Banzou
